alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 17 at 9:11AM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Additional snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible by early this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of the Green Mountains of central Vermont. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST today. * IMPACTS...Travel conditions will slowly improve as temperatures warm to near freezing, however widespread power outages will persist. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow tapers off to snow showers this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Washington
